Package it.unimi.dsi.law.util

Utility classes.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ConsistentHashFunction.SkipStrategy<T> Allows to skip suitable items when searching for the closest replica.
 

Class Summary
ConsistentHashFunction<T extends Comparable<? super T>> Provides an implementation of consistent hashing.
CRC64 Provides static methods to compute 64-bit CRCs of strings and byte arrays.
ExchangeCounter Computes the number of discordances between two orders using Knight's n log n MergeSort-based algorithm.
NormL1 Computes the L1 norm of a vector of ints/doubles:
L1 norm = Σi |vi|
NormL2 Computes the L2 norm of a vector of ints/doubles/longs:
L2 norm = sqrt(Σi vi2)
Precision A set of commodity methods to manipulate precision of doubles.
